skill.epicaddon.sao_dual_sword_skill.too: Dual Sword：An Extra Skill that unlocks the ability to weild two single-hand sword simultaneously. This skill is much more powerful than any other skill, it requires the user to have extraordinary reaction speed.
skill.epicaddon.sao_rapier_skill.tooltip: Rapier：An Skill that unlocks the ability to use different attack while weilding Rapier. This skill is much more quickly than any other skill.
